provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Constabulary Force Short title
   (Amendment) Act, 2002, and shall be read and construed ±".S"
   as one with the Constabulary Force Act (hereinafter referred
   to as the principal Act) and all amendments thereto.
